name: CommonFloor
tag_list: apartment, owners, residents, association, communication, management
overview:
CommonFloor creates private community portal for residential societies in India where residents can communicate easily with their neighbors, discuss and solve common issues, and access community updates and useful local information.

It provides various services to facilitate interaction between the members of that society. It also provides an online directory of all residents , email and SMS facility as well as Local information such as nearest petrol pump, school,doctors clinic etc.

For apartment owners association (RWA) it provides an efficient, simple and fast methods of communication (email,online and SMS). It also helps the association to maintain an online store of their documents for easy access by all the members of the society. CommonFloor also facilitates maintenance tracking , event tracking and reminders.
